scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.db-init: docker run --name ykm-db -e POSTGRES_USER=UYikamacim -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:16
scripts.db-in-docker: docker exec ykm-db psql --host=localhost --port=5432 --username=UYikamacim --dbname=postgres --command="DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS \"DYikamacim\";" && docker exec ykm-db psql --host=localhost --port=5432 --username=UYikamacim --dbname=postgres --command="CREATE DATABASE \"DYikamacim\";" && cat ./dumps/db/db_dump.sql | docker exec -i ykm-db psql --host=localhost --port=5432 --username=UYikamacim --dbname=DYikamacim
scripts.db-in: psql --host=ykm-rds-db.czggso0ksewe.eu-central-1.rds.amazonaws.com --port=5432 --username=UYikamacim --dbname=postgres --command="DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS \"DYikamacim\";" && psql --host=ykm-rds-db.czggso0ksewe.eu-central-1.rds.amazonaws.com --port=5432 --username=UYikamacim --dbname=postgres --command="CREATE DATABASE \"DYikamacim\";" && psql --host=ykm-rds-db.czggso0ksewe.eu-central-1.rds.amazonaws.com --port=5432 --username=UYikamacim --dbname=DYikamacim --file=./dumps/db/db_dump.sql
scripts.stop-prod: pm2 stop yikamacim && pm2 delete yikamacim
